alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 21 at 10:27PM CDT until March 21 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Western Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1026 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Poison Springs State Park, or 9 miles west of Camden, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Camden... Sparkman... Chidester... Poison Springs State Park... Amy... Princeton... Manning... Ouachita... Holly Springs... Vaden... Tates Bluff... Pine Grove... Bragg City... Buena Vista... Warner... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
